sources.title: DOJ Sues Visa: Antitrust Lawsuit Alleges Debit Card Market Monopolization
sources.snippet: The financial services industry has been shaken by a major antitrust lawsuit filed by the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) against Visa, one of the world's largest payment processing companies. This legal action, which alleges that Visa has monopolized the debit card market, has sent ripples through the financial sector and sparked an investor class action.
